# Worlds API Documentation

> Fetch the complete documentation index for AI discovery.

## Overview

Worlds API is the foundational Agentic Context Stack. A neuro-symbolic infrastructure layer that acts as a detachable hippocampus for AI agents.

## Core Modules

- [Agent Memory](/developer-platform/concepts/malleable-knowledge): Real-time evolving user context and profiles.
- [Content Extraction](/developer-platform/concepts/connectors): Transforming messy data into structured triples.
- [Knowledge Graphs](/api-reference/basics/sparql-query): High-precision symbolic reasoning with SPARQL.
- [Managed RAG](/api-reference/basics/search): Hybrid search with structural graph filters.

## Developer Platform

- [Quickstart](/developer-platform/getting-started/quickstart)
- [Architecture Overview](/developer-platform/concepts/architecture)
- [Server Self-Hosting](/developer-platform/infrastructure/server-hosting)
- [Local Setup](/developer-platform/infrastructure/local-setup)

## API Reference

- [Authentication](/api-reference/basics/authentication)
- [SPARQL Query](/api-reference/basics/sparql-query)
- [SPARQL Update](/api-reference/basics/sparql-update)
- [Hybrid Search](/api-reference/basics/search)

- [TypeScript SDK](/api-integrations/sdk)
- [Vercel AI SDK](/api-integrations/frameworks/vercel-ai)

- [OpenAI](/api-integrations/frameworks/openai)
